mapper.select: SELECT task_id as taskId, task_name as taskName, importance, urgency, user_id as userId, state_id as stateId FROM tasks ORDER BY task_id
SELECT task_id as taskId, task_name as taskName, importance, urgency, user_id as userId, state_id as stateId FROM tasks WHERE task_id = #{taskId}

choose.when: INSERT INTO tasks( task_name, importance, urgency, user_id ) VALUES( #{taskName}, #{importance}, #{urgency}, #{userId} )
choose.otherwise: INSERT INTO tasks( task_name, importance, urgency, user_id, state_id ) VALUES( #{taskName}, #{importance}, #{urgency}, #{userId}, #{stateId} )
